headline: Computer Vision, Image Processing
texts: One field that really interests me is Computer Vision. I find it fascinating because of its huge potential. My favorite topics within this field are segmentation, object detection, and tracking. I have worked on several projects related to these topics, and I am always eager to learn more and discuss this exciting field.

headline: Web Development
texts: I have the most experience in the field of web development. I have been working as a web developer since 2021 and have experience in various stacks, such as Python-Flask, .NET, React with Typescript. I am always interested in topics related to this field and open to learning new topics in it.

headline: Data Science
texts: I learned data science at university and I really enjoyed it. I completed several projects such as sports analytics, web scraping, and time-series analysis. I find every topic in this field interesting, especially those that are closely related to programming and engineering. However, I'm not a big fan of visualization and similar topics.

headline: Web3
texts: I am very interested in web3 topics, although I do not have much experience in the field. I created a smart contract project during my university days, which I thoroughly enjoyed. I am always open to discussing this field and would be keen to work on projects that can help me gain more experience.

headline: Databases
texts: I am passionate about big data and data science, including storing and managing data in general. I have extensive experience in SQL databases and have recently started working with NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Redis. I enjoy discussing best practices and tricks to improve performance when dealing with big or unstructured data.
